title: Can the B2 connect to more than one handset?
answer:
Yes, the B2 can connect to two phones simultaneously. You can answer incoming calls from either phone.

Steps to connect B2 to two phones:

  • Connect the B2 to the first phone using Bluetooth
  • Then press the side button on the B2 - when the Bluetooth icon blinks - connect the second phone.
Note: If the first connection breaks - just reconnect through the Bluetooth device list on your phone.

The  icon will be displayed when both phones are connected to your B2.
